Discounts for booking multiple courses:

The courses can be taken individually, but have also been designed to work together to build on the knowledge and skills gained.

There are also great discounts for booking three or more courses:

  • 3+ courses: $300 + BF + GST (per course)

About your trainer

Jen Evison – from Jennifer Evison Consulting – has extensive experience in the social media space and is renowned for her food and beverage marketing. Previously, she managed the social media channels for Allrecipes in the US before moving to Australia and continues to work with Australian and US businesses helping them achieve social media success over the past decade, including a prominent wine brand.

With tertiary qualifications in business marketing, she has a genuine talent for strategising, being across best practice and creatively discovering and constructing effective content for a range of social media channels.

Jen has an unending enthusiasm for presenting and participants will be delighted by her effervescent and good humoured nature.
